method.name: flickr.photosets.comments.getList
method.description: Returns the comments for a photoset.
method.response: <comments photoset_id="109722179"> <comment id="6065-109722179-72057594077818641" author="35468159852@N01" authorname="Rev Dan Catt" date_create="1141841470" permalink="http://www.flickr.com/photos/straup/109722179/#comment72057594077818641" >Umm, I'm not sure, can I get back to you on that one?</comment> </comments>

arguments.argument: Your API application key. See here for more details.
The id of the photoset to fetch comments for.

errors.error: The date argument passed was incorrect.
